name: goodbyes (Fulmen)
description:
Alex hasn‘t seen her best friend Naomi in weeks until she suddenly gets a text message inviting her over. Naomi‘s moving. Tomorrow. And this will be Alex' last chance to see her.

But there‘s still so much left unsaid…

Features

goodbyes is a a short, bittersweet Visual Novel/ Point and Click Adventure about friendship, love, and growing up

  • 4 different endings
  • gay yearning
  • Playtime: 10 - 20min
  • Original art & story
